item.description: We just moved here from Chicago during the month of January and I would like to set up a play date during weekdays for my 2 y.o. daughter and meet on the weekly base. I can host the play dates in my house or we can always meet at the playgrounds or find an activity to go to.

group.name: Families with Russian Kids, Moms Club, Playgroups

item.name: Playgroup for children 2-3 y.o. in or near Lexington
